org.spf4j.junit

Class Spf4jRunListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.runner.notification.RunListener
      • org.spf4j.junit.Spf4jRunListener

  • @NotThreadSafe
public final class Spf4jRunListener
extends org.junit.runner.notification.RunListener
    A Junit run listener that will collect performance profiles for your unit tests. Works only if unit tests are NOT executed in parallel inside the same JVM. To enable this Run listener with maven, you will need to configure your maven-surefire-plugin with: org.apache.maven.plugins maven-surefire-plugin listener org.spf4j.junit.Spf4jRunListener spf4j.junit.sampleTimeMillis 5 and add spf4j-junit to your test classpath: org.spf4j spf4j-junit ${spf4j.version} test
    Author:
    zoly
